title: Did the carjackers leave the planes and $100 bills on the car windows?
subtitle: He warned that car thieves put leaflets or $100 on car windows, and then take cars when drivers exit their vehicles to remove them.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Parking carjackers put leaflets or $100 on car windows, and then take cars when drivers come out of their vehicles to remove them.
